name: Besieged (V)
Lore: 'Stormtroopers blasted through the main airlock of the Tantive IV. The Rebel soldiers'' attempt to defend the intrusion was no match for the Empire''s superior firepower.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. If opponent just forfeited a character or unpiloted starship at same system or sector as your Imperial capital starship, you may draw destiny. Character or starship is captured if destiny > its destiny number. (Immune to Alter.)',
